posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Hi there, Nekro83, and WELCOME!

It's bad luck that I happen to be your first reply, because I won't pretend to be anything like a master at building (I might carry a hod, but I'm no mason or architect).

That said, I'm fairly sure those who could give constructive help will need to know a few more things. Which server are you using, because some of the stats you give seem very different from most - for example, with all the NwN stuff I've played and read about, extra points in any stat (in your case STR or CHA) are available every 4 levels (4, 8, 12, 16, 20, etc). Equally, Divine Wrath seems to work differently (standard is that for every 5 levels of CoT you take - after the first +3 5/1 at level 5 - attack and damage bonuses increase by a further 2).

These are just examples. Other questions might include: what sort of Divine Spellcasting are you looking for? What's the overall nature of your intended build? Solo ass-kicker or party member/leader? What sort of enmvironment will you be playing in (high, med or low magic - what's available to be picked up)?

Hope this doesn't sound negative, I'm just trying to lay the groundwork for the sort of quality build these guys produse.

Again, good to have you aboard!

EDIT: Except I'm not your first reply! The mighty Empyre got in there earlier. He'll ask more sensible questions!

The bonus to your saves from CoT levels counts towards the +20 maximum bonus to saves, and 30 CoT take up 15 of those 20. If you have a Cloak of Fortitude +7, you only get +5 saves from it, because the other 2 would go over the +20 limit. For this reason, I did not train Spellcraft because that also counts towards the +20 limit. Luckily, the CHA saves bonus from, Paladin does not count towards that +20 limit.
